mapper.select: select sys_no as "sysNo" from user_system where cust_no = #{userNo}
SELECT SYS_NO AS "sysNo", SYS_NM AS "sysNm" FROM SYSTEM WHERE SYS_NM != '한국소프트SRM'
SELECT SR_TYPE_NO AS "srTypeNo", SR_TYPE_NM AS "srTypeNm" FROM SR_TYPE
SELECT STTS_NO AS "sttsNo", STTS_NM AS "sttsNm" FROM SR_STTS
SELECT DISTINCT USER_OGDP AS "userOgdp" FROM users WHERE user_ogdp !='한국소프트SRM'
SELECT DISTINCT SR_DEV_DP AS "srDevDp" FROM SR WHERE SR_DEV_DP IS NOT NULL
SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(sr_no,INSTR(sr_no,'-',6)+1)) from sr where sr_no LIKE #{sysNo} order by sr_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sr (sr_no, sr_cust_no, sys_no, sr_std, stts_no, sr_ttl, sr_cn, sr_reg_date) VALUES (#{srNo}, #{srCustNo}, #{sysNo}, #{srStd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{sttsNo}, #{srTtl}, #{srCn}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO SR_FILE( SR_FILE_NO, SR_NO, SR_FILE_PHYS_NM, SR_FILE_ACTL_NM, SR_FILE_EXTN_NM) VALUES(srFileNo_seq.nextval, #{srNo}, #{srFilePhysNm}, #{srFileActlNm}, #{srFileExtnNm})
mapper.select: SELECT sr_no as "srNo", user_nm as "userNm", user_ogdp as "userOgdp", sr_reg_date as "srRegDate", sys_nm as "sysNm", sr_ttl as "srTtl", sr_std as "srStd", sr_cn as "srCn" FROM SR s, USERS u, SYSTEM sys WHERE s.sr_cust_no = u.user_no and sys.sys_no = s.sys_no and sr_no = #{srNo}
SELECT SR_FILE_NO AS "srFileNo", SR_NO AS "srNo", SR_FILE_PHYS_NM AS "srFilePhysNm", SR_FILE_ACTL_NM AS "srFileActlNm", SR_FILE_EXTN_NM AS "srFileExtnNm" FROM sr_FILE WHERE sr_no = #{srNo}
SELECT SR_FILE_NO AS "srFileNo", SR_NO AS "srNo", SR_FILE_PHYS_NM AS "srFilePhysNm", SR_FILE_ACTL_NM AS "srFileActlNm", SR_FILE_EXTN_NM AS "srFileExtnNm" FROM sr_FILE WHERE sr_file_no = #{srFileNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE SR SET SR_REG_DATE=SYSDATE, SR_TTL=#{srTtl}, SR_CN=#{srCn}, SR_STD=#{srStd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE SR_NO=#{srNo}
UPDATE SR SET SR_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE SR_NO=#{srNo}
